original_title: A Storm Is Coming - Finally, A Night Alone With My Aunt
overview: My mother's sister, Aunt Maki, is something I admire. The moment I first met, I fell in love. A woman who fell in love with me at first glance ... took care of me while my parents were away on a trip. For the next few days, I was so nervous and anticipated that I couldn't sleep at night. However, unfortunately, a large typhoon hit directly on the day. Just as I thought I wouldn't be able to come in this rain, Aunt Maki, who was soaked in bishobisho, came over ...
title: A Storm Is Coming - Finally, A Night Alone With My Aunt
